attributes.action: Introduce education of "The Lick" to performance-based undergraduate degrees
attributes.background: Having been a student studying music and improvisation for the past 18 months, I find the lack of knowledge and information surrounding The Lick to be both staggering and inappropriate. I would like to change this so that future generations can loop 2-5-1 progressions with peace and clarity.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the university concerned and not the UK Government and Parliament.
